header.title: Explore the Frankencoin Ecosystem.
header.subtitle: Pay, swap, borrow, buy tokenized stocks, exchange for fiat currency, and more with tools that are built on top of the Frankencoin protocol.

intro.title: Browse and search projects using Frankencoin.
intro.subtitle: Building something cool?

tabs.name: Aktionariat
tabs.description: Aktionariat AG is a Swiss corporation based in Zurich. Its purpose is to enable Swiss companies to create a market for their shares.Since only a fraction of Swiss companies are publicly traded, Aktionariat's vision is to fundamentally change this by creating liquid markets for thousands of additional Swiss companies, potentially unlocking billions in dormant economic value. This strategy aims to provide companies with better access to capital and significantly broaden the investment spectrum for investors, fostering long-term value investing and establishing a culture of sustainable, transparent, and decentralized finance.

tabs.name: Mt Pelerin
tabs.description: With Mt Pelerin, you can easily buy ZCHF with zero fees directly on any of your self-custodial wallets, swap it for BTC, ETH, stablecoins and many more, and cash it out back on your bank account at any time, still without fees. You can also get a personal IBAN for your wallet and use it to receive bank transfers from anyone directly in ZCHF, and send bank transfers to anyone using ZCHF from your wallet.

tabs.name: DFX
tabs.description: DFX is the bridge between the traditional banking world and the cryptocurrency space and enables private and corporate customers to buy and sell cryptocurrencies the most convenient way possible. With DFX Services, there are many ways to buy and sell cryptocurrencies via bank and credit card transactions. You can buy cryptocurrencies directly into popular wallets such as Metamask, Rabby Wallet or more than 300 Wallets using WalletConnect and hardware wallets such as BitBox, Ledger and Trezor.

tabs.name: Stay Liquid
tabs.description: Stay Liquid has built a novel business savings account powered by DeFi and enhanced by AI. Clients can access returns on their idle assets in Euros or British Pounds, which is generating over 10% annual returns, by using a stablecoin-only smart portfolio management solution. Stay Liquid has a familiar ‘neobank’-style interface to ensure assets are secure and onboarding is effortless.

tabs.name: Ammer.cash
tabs.description: Ammer.cash is a versatile platform designed to facilitate crypto payments seamlessly. It enables businesses to accept payments in various cryptocurrencies through the Ammer Pay app, which can be used as a point-of-sale terminal. The service supports payments via Ammer Cards, QR codes, and smartphones, significantly reducing transaction fees compared to traditional methods like Visa and Mastercard.

tabs.name: Operal
tabs.description: Operal AG is a Swiss Startup working on gameification of impact. The B2B clients include Pensionfunds,the Liechtenstein Bankers Association, and large SMEs in Switzerland. On the B2C side Operal is providing Hypercasual Mobile Games with impact to the entire world and has established a extremly high reputation for excellence and innovation.

tabs.name: Zippy
tabs.description: Zippy is a user-friendly crypto wallet that emphasizes security and ease of use. It features social recovery, allowing you to restore your wallet using trusted contacts. You can send and request crypto through your phone contacts without needing public keys. The wallet also supports buying and selling crypto with credit cards or IBAN payments and converting it back to fiat.

tabs.name: Uniswap
tabs.description: The Uniswap Protocol is an open-source protocol for providing liquidity and trading ERC20 tokens on Ethereum. It eliminates trusted intermediaries and unnecessary forms of rent extraction, allowing for safe, accessible, and efficient exchange activity. The protocol is non-upgradable and designed to be censorship resistant.

tabs.name: Frankencoin App
tabs.description: Frankencoin App is a self-custody wallet powered by DFX.swiss. It allows users to easily buy FPS, ZCHF or other cryptocurrencies via bank transfer, send or receive payments and much more in upcoming updates.
